title: Criticism of the Western Civilization - Collection 48 (Racism 2)
description:
Criticism of the Western Civilization - Collection 48 (Racism 2):

Welcome back TBP.

We have 35 titles here:

-  Allen - The Invention of the White Race, Vol. II; the Origin of Racial Oppression in Anglo-America (2012)

-  Angelou - Even the Stars Look Lonesome (1987)

-  Beasley - Without Mercy; the Stunning True Story of Race, Crime, and Corruption in the Deep South (2014)

-  Bethencourt - Racisms from the Crusades to the Twentieth Century (2013)

-  Branch - At Canaan's Edge; America in the King Years, 1965-68 (2006)

-  Cunningham - Klansville, U.S.A., the Rise and Fall of the Civil Rights-Era Ku Klux Klan (2013)

-  Dalton - A Practical Guide to Racism (2008)

-  Freeburg - Melville and the Idea of Blackness; Race and Imperialism in Nineteenth-Century America (2012)

-  Gillborn - Racism and Education; Coincidence or Conspiracy (2008)

-  Greenhaw - Fighting the Devil in Dixie; How Civil Rights Activists Took on the Ku Klux Klan in Alabama (2011)

-  Haller - Outcasts from Evolution; Scientific Attitudes of Racial Inferiority, 1859-1900 (1971)

-  Harris - Racial Disproportionality in Child Welfare (2014)

-  Hollandsworth - The Portrait of a Scientific Racist; Alfred Holt Stone of Mississippi (2008)

-  Humphrys et al (Eds.) - On Utoya; Aners Breivik, Right Terror, Racism and Europe (2011)

-  Jackson & Weidman - Race, Racism and Science; Social Impact and Interaction (2004)

-  Jong - Invisible Enemy; the African American Freedom Struggle After 1965 (2010)

-  Lopez - Dog Whistle Politics; How Coded Racial Appeals Have Reinvented Racism & Wrecked the Middle Class (2014)

-  Love - Race Over Empire; Racism & U.S. Imperialism, 1865-1900 (2004)

-  Maddison - Beyond White Guilt; the Real Challenge for Black-White Relations in Australia (2011)

-  Miles & Brown - Racism, 2e (2003)

-  Miller - Search and Destroy; African-American Males in the Criminal Justice System, 2e (2011)

-  Newton - The Ku Klux Klan in Mississippi; a History (2010)

-  Pegram - One Hundred Percent American; the Rebirth and Decline of the Ku Klus Klan in the 1920s (2011)

-  Posner - Killing the Dream; James Earl Ray and the Assassination of Martin Luther King, Jr. (1998)

-  Roberts - Fatal Invention; How Science, Politics, and Big Business Re-Create Race in the 21st Century (2011)

-  Rucker & Upton (Eds.) - Encyclopedia of American Race Riots, Vols. 1 & 2 (2007)

-  Singh - Black is a Country; Race and the Unfinished Struggle for Democracy (2004)

-  Slide - American Racist; the Life and Films of Thomas Dixon (2004)

-  Stone & Rizova - Racial Conflict in Global Society (2014)

-  Teel - Racism and the Image of God (2010)

-  Tuck  - The Night Malcolm X Spoke at the Oxford Union; a Transatlantic Story of Antiracist Protest (2014)

-  van Dijk - Racism and Discourse in Spain and Latin America (2005)

-  West - Race Matters (2001)

-  Witt - Black Hunger; Soul Food and America (1999)

-  Wormser - The Rise and Fall of Jim Crow (2003)
